item.title: Retheme Product
item.description: Formally a front-end developer, I feel confortable and confident carrying out work in this space The CXcoach cloud based product needed a ‘face lift’. I investigated the most frugal way to provide the product with a new look and feel, one that is aligned with industry expectations. I settled on an open source theme and provided my UX lead developer a branch of code that used this new theme for him to complete and fix any style and placement issues.
